languages.text: "Надзиратели заблокированы в охранных комплексах, но среди каторжан немало тех, кто верен Вашей Светлости. Они помнят, сколь милосердно вы поступали с ними в прошлом, и могут сменить сторону".

"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."
languages.original_text: "Надзиратели заблокированы в охранных комплексах, но среди каторжан немало тех, кто верен Вашей Светлости. Они помнят, сколь милосердно вы поступали с ними в прошлом, и могут сменить сторону".

traits.locale_text: "The wardens are trapped up inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember how merciful you have been to them in the past, and may switch sides."

"The wardens are trapped up inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember how merciful you have been to them in the past, and may switch sides."

"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."

"The wardens are trapped inside the security facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."

"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many people who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They still remember your charitable mercy in the past and may switch sides."

"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."

"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."

"The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."

languages.text: “监察员都被困在了安全设施里，但囚犯之中还有很多人忠于您。他们记得您过去的仁慈之举，可能会加入您的行列。”
languages.original_text: "The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."

traits.locale_text: “监察员都被困在了安全设施里，但囚犯之中还有很多人忠于您。他们记得您过去的仁慈之举，可能会加入您的行列。”
“监察员都被困在了安全设施里，但囚犯之中还有很多人忠于您。他们还记得您过去的仁慈之举，有可能会加入您的行列。”

languages.text: «Los supervisores están atrapados en las instalaciones de seguridad, pero hay muchos convictos que aún le son leales, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Recuerdan su misericordia anterior y aún pueden cambiar de bando».
languages.original_text: "The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."

traits.locale_text: «Los supervisores están atrapados en las instalaciones de seguridad, pero hay muchos convictos que aún le son leales, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Recuerdan su misericordia anterior y aún pueden cambiar de bando».

languages.text: 「看守らは警備施設内に閉じ込められていますが、陛下に忠誠を誓っている者が大勢います。囚人の中には、過去の陛下の慈悲ある行いを覚えているので、寝返る可能性はあります」
languages.original_text: "The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."

traits.locale_text: 「看守らは警備施設内に閉じ込められていますが、陛下に忠誠を誓っている者が大勢います。彼らはいまだに、過去のあなたの慈悲ある行いを覚えているので、寝返る可能性はあります」
「看守らは警備施設内に閉じ込められていますが、陛下に忠誠を誓っている者が大勢います。彼らはいまだに、過去のあなたの慈悲ある行いを覚えているので、寝返る可能性はあります」

languages.text: « Les contremaîtres sont piégés à l'intérieur des installations de sécurité, mais la majeure partie des détenus vous reste fidèle, Votre Seigneurie. Ils n'ont pas oublié votre magnanimité et pourraient bien changer de camp. »
languages.original_text: "The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."

traits.locale_text: « Les contremaîtres sont piégés à l'intérieur des installations de sécurité, mais la majeure partie des détenus vous reste fidèle, Votre Seigneurie. Ils n'ont pas oublié votre magnanimité et pourraient bien changer de camp. »

languages.text: "Die Aufseher sitzen in den Wachstationen in der Falle, aber viele der Sträflinge halten Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} die Treue. Sie erinnern sich daran, wie gnädig Ihr wart, und könnten die Seiten wechseln."
languages.original_text: "The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."

traits.locale_text: "Die Aufseher sitzen in den Wachstationen in der Falle, aber viele der Sträflinge halten Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} die Treue. Sie erinnern sich daran, wie gnädig Ihr wart, und könnten die Seiten wechseln."

"Die Wärter sind in den Sicherheitsanlagen eingesperrt, doch es gibt viele Leute, die Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} treu ergeben sind. Sie erinnern sich daran, wie gnädig Ihr wart, und könnten die Seiten wechseln."

languages.text: "Gözetmenler muhafız tesislerinde mahsur kalmış ama zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne sadık olan çok sayıda mahkûm var. Gösterdiğiniz merhameti unutmuş değiller, taraf değiştirmeleri olası."
languages.original_text: "The overseers are trapped inside the guard facilities, but there are many among the convicts who are loyal to Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. They remember your charitable mercy and may yet switch sides."

traits.locale_text: "Gözetmenler muhafız tesislerinde mahsur kalmış ama zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'ne sadık olan çok sayıda mahkûm var. Gösterdiğiniz merhameti unutmuş değiller, taraf değiştirmeleri olası."
